amendment.description: To clarify that child victims of sex trafficking are eligible to receive assistance under grants provided to enhance the safety of youth and children.

vote.text: Amendment SA 10 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 100 - 0. Record Vote Number: 16.

action.text: Amendment SA 10 proposed by Senator Portman.
